code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Filters.css';import CategoryInput from"./CategoryInput";import PriceSilder from"./priceSilder";import BrandInput from"./BrandInput";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FilterComponent=_ref=>{let{onFilter}=_ref;const[price,setPrice]=useState('');const[category,setCategory]=useState('');const[brand,setBrand]=useState('');const[rating,setRating]=useState('');const handleFilter=()=>{onFilter({price,category,brand,rating});};const names=['smartphones','laptops','fragrances','mens-watches','skincare','mens-shoes','home-decoration','tops'];const namesBrand=['Apple','Samsung','Infinix"','Microsoft Surface','HP Pavilion','Impression of Acqua Di Gio','Royal_Mirage','Dermive"'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Filter Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PriceSilder,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Category:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryInput,{names:names})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Brand:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrandInput,{names:namesBrand})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleFilter,children:"Apply Filter"})]});};export default FilterComponent;
